instruction:
Word Use and Vocabulary

This section of the test contains multiple-choice questions, which you must answer by using your computer mouse to select the correct response. Upon answering a question, you can go to the next question by clicking the Next button on the Menu bar.

During this section of the test, if you choose you may skip an item and then later return to that item.

When you are finished, select Submit from the Menu bar. Your Test Administrator may have set a time limit for this test section. If there is a time limit, you will be told how much time you have. If a time limit has been set for this section of the test, you will notice a countdown timer on the Header of the screen, showing the amount of time remaining to complete this section of the test.

questions.questionText:
Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the correctly spelled words.

Many people are ______________ of other's _____________ and religion, which leads to bigotry.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the correctly spelled words.

Whose _____________ is written on the paperwork dated for the ____________ of June?

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the correctly spelled words.

Please ___________ check the _____________ for any intruders into our building.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the correctly spelled words.

The most ____________ feature of this program is that it can track ____________ differences.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

By putting in the _____________ effort, it is possible to improve ____________ in a short amount of time.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

By progressing ___________ in leaps and bounds, you will get you to your destination ____________.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

The builders were commissioned to _____________ a new ______________ that would make it the tallest in the world.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

The evidence in this case will ___________ the ____________ of the master criminal and bring him/her to justice.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

The _____________ luxury handbag is selling for a fraction of the price of a ___________ one.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

The _____________ musician could _____________ a range of sounds that normal people could not.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

It takes some people a long time to _____________ on what to _____________ from the menu at a restaurant.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

Don't ____________ the team; you are a(n) ____________ part of it.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

When the submarine _____________ underwater, it cannot be _____________ by radar.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

Run the data ____________ on the ____________ dataset so we can have the highest number of responses.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

This menu is primarily ____________ of local dishes, but also includes dishes from the owner's _________ background.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

Fortunately the judge was _______ in the case, allowing him to be impartial, but each word the attorney said led him ________ from the truth.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

When you arrive at the airport, you'll meet our __________; he will help you get into the ___________ of things.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

Please see me at your earliest ___________ so that we may discuss the _____________ differences between our two positions.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

I'm sure there is some ____________ for the lack of a ____________ for this particular service.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the most appropriate words.

We can neither confirm nor deny the __________ of the ____________ known as 47b-312.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

The most common ____________ of ____________ are all represented in theaters now.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

The _____________ of Motor Vehicle in California is responsible for ______________ records for all drivers licensed in California.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

A professional consultant was hired to ensure that no _____________ will ___________ with our new system.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

Put away all the __________ on the floor so that we can begin ___________ the room.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

Please fill out all the required _____________ and have them _____________ by the close of business today.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the most appropriate words.

Everyone who will ____________ in more than one of the _____________ venues will receive a certificate.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the correctly spelled words.

Once we _____________ your information we will make a _____________ review of your credentials.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the correctly spelled words.

You should continue to _____________ your dreams even if it will ___________ your current priorities.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the correctly spelled words.

After one year of working for the company, your supervisor will ______________ your work _______________ and document it in your employee record.

Choose the option that will fill in the blank with the correctly spelled words.

The union ____________ for a revised ______________ for the teacher's union.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the correctly spelled words.

Lay the pipe at least 10 feet behind the water __________, being careful to move __________ the barrier fence.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the correctly spelled words.

Excuse me, ___________ car is parked behind ____________ building?

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the correctly spelled words.

It can be hard to wake up in the ____________ if you don't have enough _____________.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the correctly spelled words.

If _________ of the five _______ can detect something, does it exist?

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the correctly spelled words.

No running is allowed on the _________; we have ___ many injuries when people do that.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the correctly spelled words.

We respect those that __________ to carry a heavy __________.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the correctly spelled words.

What ____________ town needs is a __________ new look.

Choose the option that will fill in the blanks with the correctly spelled words.

_______ peacocks will often display elaborate plumage to attract mates; their feathers _________ be bright to catch the attention of the female of the species.

The ___________ of tire tracks that frame the intersection is from people quickly applying their ___________ when they see the stop sign.

The contractor was asked to remove that __________ sooner than they had ___________ they would need to remove it.

Blood that runs through a __________ is colored ____________.
